Total snow accumulations of 10 to 14 inches over mainly the north half of the Salt River and Wyoming ranges, with totals of 4 to 8 inches in the south. West wind gusting 35 to 45 mph, especially in exposed areas.

entry.title: Winter Storm Watch issued November 03 at 12:32PM MDT until November 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow likely. Preliminary total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, with higher totals possible north and east of Moran Junction. Southwest wind 15 to 30 mph. * WHERE...Jackson Hole.

entry.title: Winter Storm Watch issued November 03 at 12:32PM MDT until November 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow likely. Preliminary total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, with 6 to 10 inches possible in the foothills along the east side of the valley. Southwest wind 15 to 25 mph.

entry.title: High Wind Watch issued November 03 at 2:49AM MDT until November 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through Saturday evening.

entry.summary: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts in excess of 80 mph possible. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through Saturday evening.

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 03 at 2:29AM MDT until November 04 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range and Snowy Range. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM MDT Friday.

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 03 at 2:29AM MDT until November 04 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches for the north Laramie Range. * WHERE...Converse County Lower Elevations, North Laramie Range and Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County.

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 03 at 2:29AM MDT until November 04 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southeast Wyoming. * WHEN...From 4 AM Thursday to 6 AM MDT Friday.
